sentences.sContent: And as Thecla sat upon her back,the lioness licked her feet, and all the crowed was amazed.
sentences.sContent_eng: And as Thecla sat upon her back,the lioness licked her feet, and all the crowed was amazed.
sentences.sCn: 特格拉坐在雌狮背上，雌狮舔她的脚，所有人惊讶不已

words.tran: 狮子；名人；勇猛的人；社交场合的名流
